vendors.Name: Netlify
Purposes: Primary site hosting with edge CDN and automatic HTTPS
CI/CD auto-deploy on push to main branch
Serverless functions for SSR guestbook route

vendors.Name: Turso
Purposes: Self-hosted libSQL database for guestbook submissions

vendors.Name: GitHub
Purposes: Alternate site hosting via GitHub Pages
Source code repository and version control
GitHub API for project data, commit history, and contributor info
OpenGraph image generation for project cards

vendors.Name: IcoMoon
Purposes: Custom icon font (self-hosted, generated via icomoon.io)

vendors.Name: Pagefind
Purposes: Static site search (self-hosted, generated at build time)
